sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'
import * as d3 from 'd3'

const PieChart = ({ data }) => {
  const svgRef = useRef()

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!data || !data.errors || !data.semantic) return

    const { errors, semantic } = data

    const dataset = Object.entries(semantic).map(
      ([semanticKey, semanticValue]) => ({
        semantic: semanticKey,
        errors: errors[semanticKey] || 0,
      })
    )

    const width = 460
    const height = 300

    const radius = Math.min(width, height) / 2
    const color = d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.schemeCategory10)

    const pie = d3
      .pie()
      .sort(null)
      .value((d) => d.errors)

    const arc = d3.arc().innerRadius(0).outerRadius(radius)

    const svg = d3.select(svgRef.current)

    svg.selectAll('*').remove()

    const g = svg
      .append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${width / 2},${height / 2})`)

    const path = g
      .selectAll('path')
      .data(pie(dataset))
      .enter()
      .append('path')
      .attr('fill', (d, i) => color(i))
      .attr('d', arc)

    path
      .append('text')
      .attr('transform', (d) => `translate(${arc.centroid(d)})`)
      .attr('dy', '0.35em')
      .text((d) => d.data.semantic)
  }, [data])

  return <svg ref={svgRef} width={460} height={300}></svg>
}

export default PieChart
